meanings.definition: Preventing or inhibiting the formation of foam.
meanings.sent1: The antifoaming agent helped keep the liquid smooth and bubble-free.
meanings.sent2: The antifoaming properties of the detergent made it perfect for washing dishes.
meanings.sent3: The antifoaming solution was so effective that even the bubbles seemed surprised!
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like an antifoaming shield against the chaos around her.
meanings.sent5: The antifoaming spray worked like magic, making the foam disappear instantly.

meanings.definition: A substance used to reduce or eliminate foam.
meanings.sent1: The factory used antifoaming in their production process to prevent excessive bubbling.
meanings.sent2: The chef added a drop of antifoaming to the boiling pot to avoid spills.
meanings.sent3: The antifoaming in the shampoo made bath time a breeze with no messy bubbles.
meanings.sent4: The antifoaming in the paint ensured a smooth finish without any unwanted foam.
meanings.sent5: With a touch of antifoaming, the scientist created a solution free of bubbles.
